recipe.title: Ginger Beef Stir Fry
recipe.instructions:
1. Thinly slice sirloin against grain in 1 inch wide strips. Cut each water chestnut in half. In a large skillet or wok, quickly brown sirloin in hot oil. Stir in chestnuts, carrots, onion, garlic and ginger until onion is soft. Stir in pepper and lettuce for one minute. Stir in marmalade and soy sauce. Cook, stirring about 2 minutes. Serve at once.
  2. Makes 4 servings.
recipe.summary: Ginger Beef Stir Fry might be just the main course you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains roughly 32g of protein, 12g of fat, and a total of 416 calories. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. If you have water chestnuts, bell pepper, top sirloin steak, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it.
